Nomura (1977) described
Miridiba kuraruana
based on a male holotype and thirty-three paratypes ( 18 males and 15 females ). After studying the holotype and four paratypes of
M. kuraruana
, we conclude that
M. kuraruana
shows features of male and female genitalia that characterize morphotype I “
Trichophora
”. Hence, this species is included in this genital morphotype I.
